name: 賴建宏
objective:
本課程主要以市面上常見的微控制器開發板，搭配 tinyML 做到在微處理機上的 AI
This course is mainly based on the common microcontroller development board on the market, with tinyML to achieve AI on the microprocessor
schedule:
AI Trends - Notebooks
Table of Contents
  Installation Guide
  Getting Started
  First steps
  Convert & Optimize
  Model Demos
  Model Training
  Live Demos
  System Requirements
  Run the Notebooks
  Launch a Single Notebook
  Launch all Notebooks
  Cleaning Up
  Troubleshooting
scorePolicy:
Midterm 30%
Final presentation 30%
平時成績 40%
materials: 自己與廠商整理的講義和投影片與範例
